purpose: Evaluate unprofitable new accounts and recommend product or strategy changes.
title: Case Study #2: Evaluate how unprofitable new accounts are, determine root cause of financial underperformance, and recommend product and/or strategy changes

bullets.text: Analyzed account level data; segmentation, forecasting with enhanced interchange rates for WE product

Showed net transaction costs (rewards, MC/Processor costs) and interest expense of transactors were significantly unprofitable. Proposed modifying new account card type fulfillment approach for some customers which will earn higher interchange and make select customers profitable

reasoning_strategy: Data analysis and segmentation to identify unprofitable patterns and propose a tailored strategy.
